DOC.detailed_description: Detailed Description : 40 patient meet inclusion criterion screen test assign one two group ( PDRN group 15 % dextrose active control group ) randomization . They take three time ultrasonography-guided injection four week ( 0,2,4 week ) double-blind . PDRN group take ultrasonography-guided 3ml PDRN injection lesion ( tear tendinosis extensor carpus radialis brevis , extensor digitorum communis , radial collateral ligament ) lateral epicondylitis 4 week . Active control group take 15 % dextrose solution , 3ml procedure . The main outcome variable measure 0 , 6 week 3 month 1st injection start point compare difference baseline 3 month primary end point within group group . Polydeoxyribonucleotide verify whether safety effect lateral epicondylitis compare prolotherapy .
